channel.title: Anmeldung on Tenants Support
channel.description: Recent content in Anmeldung on Tenants Support

item.title: What is Anmeldung?
item.description: Anmeldung is your city registration. It enables you to get a tax ID, library card, and access other services. You need to make an appointment for this at the BÃ¼rgeramt ideally within a month of arriving in Germany. You need to bring your rental contract as proof of address to your Anmeldung appointment. If your subletter/main tenant says “no Anmeldung possible,” that is a sign that the sublet is illegal (not cleared by the landlord).
